page.title: 02Farming
page.content: The area is mainly farmland, and mostly arable. The main crops grown are rape, wheat, barley, potatoes and linseed. The remaining farmland is enclosed grazing with some small deciduous woodland scattered around the area. The livestock is variable - sheep of different breeds including Jacob and Hardwick, Cattle for both beef and milk production, goats and mules. Deer can be seen occasionally crossing the farms. At 04330253 there are some fishponds. At present two are stocked with tench and the third pond is under construction and will be stocked with carp. The fishing rights are let out.
